summary: Leading the digital transformation of financial processes, building modern web applications that streamline operations and enhance customer experience. Specialized in developing scalable .NET solutions and seamless system integrations.
highlights: Architected and developed MVC Models and View Models for efficient data management across multiple modules
Built and maintained Task, Employee, Projects, and Status Modules, ensuring seamless workflow integration
Integrated Payout Project with legacy financial systems, enabling real-time data synchronization and improved processing
Optimized database operations through complex SQL queries and stored procedures, improving query performance
Designed intuitive user interfaces for both internal teams and customers, resulting in improved usability and adoption
Maintained high code quality through rigorous debugging and systematic bug resolution processes
Enhanced user experience with clear error handling and intuitive interface design patterns
Orchestrated end-to-end software delivery pipeline, managing builds, releases, and deployments
